short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Suggests optimal solutions to Glimmer & Gloom on Flight Rising

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Presents users with an optimal solution to Glimmer and Gloom games on Flight Rising. To use it, start a game of Glimmer and Gloom and press the "action" button for the extension. A side panel will appear that will display a copy of the current game with the tiles highlighted that the user should click.
